source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Learn to Paint Pets with Oil Paint - Pet Portrait Tutorial
items.headline: Learn the tips and tricks of painting pets from a full-time artist
objectives_summary: Learn what brushes, paint, and equipment you will need
Learn about colour theory and colour mixing
Learn how to paint a pet's nose, eyes, and fur

items.title: Sketching For 15 Minutes a Day - 4 Ideas Of a Few Minutes
items.headline: Improve your creativity and skills by building an habit
objectives_summary: How to build a habit to sketch and paint every day
Create every day
Manage time

objectives_summary: How to select the right materials
How to paint light and shadows in the water
How to create thumbnail sketches before painting

objectives_summary: Painting mountain landscape in oils and acrylics

items.title: Learn decor crafts from your used wine bottles
items.headline: Learn how to make crafts from your used wine bottles that you can use to decorate your space at home or work
objectives_summary: How to use spray paint and Jute twine on bottles; How to use different materials to accessorize bottles.

items.title: Learn to Create your Own Mosaic Artworks
items.headline: Masterclass for creating own design for any kind of mosaic artworks
objectives_summary: Design Various Kinds of Mosaics

Explore Various Artforms

items.title: Drawing & Coloring

objectives_summary: Drawing & Coloring
Layering of Portraits

items.title: Draw and Paint a Pet Portrait Accurately
items.headline: Learn to draw a dog portrait with pastel pencils and soft pastels. Learn step-by-step how to use a proportional divider
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to use a proportional divider to enlarge a photo accurately.
The proportional divider instrument is used to maintain scale ratio when transferring a drawing to another surface.
Students will learn how to choose pastels and layer colors to achieve more depth and realism.

items.title: Using music to create abstract paintings
items.headline: Easy tips that anyone can do
objectives_summary: Abstract painting using music as a muse.
